title: Message to the Lord's Day Alliance.
text:
My dear Dr. Bowlby:

I am interested to learn that the Lord's Day Alliance of the United States will celebrate its forty-third anniversary on December 6th-7th. Its vigilant work in promoting reverent respect for the Sabbath Day is a potent factor in preserving the sacredness of that Day against secularization. Yours faithfully,

HERBERT HOOVER [Rev. H. L. Bowlby, D.D., General Secretary, Lord's Day Alliance of the United States, 156 Fifth Avenue, New York City]
